steps.128: add-add lime juice to the bowl
steps.130: Add-1 teaspoon of pepper powder to the bowl
steps.132: Add-Add the corn into a microwave-safe bowl
steps.76: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
steps.134: Microwave-Microwave the corn for 3 more minutes
